: : Kup : : 
Kup turns back to Katya. 
Kup: Aye, lass, I know. It would hurt the Maximal force to lose you two, but if you want to be human again we will support you in this. So all that is left is one question, do you really want to do this? 
 Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: Katya held Kup back with a force that was not obvious in her slender body.

Katya: Kup, you do not understand, quineg? After Ragnar and I have
gone through this, you lose two warriors...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : : 
> Kup: Yes I know, but we can't make the rescue attempt right now. We
need Windlord out of quorantine, and for the plague to move on. 
> Kup then turns to the others. 
> Kup: What's the estimated time on the rust plague cload moveing on? 
>  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote: Katya: You know that if it works, I
will be human again and I will not
> be physically able to fight your kind. That means that if you need me
> or Ragnar to get Vlad back, you will have to do it now...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup walks over to the corner of the room with Katya.
> > Kup: What is it, lass?
> >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Katya: Then please start coding it.
> Kup, I have to talk to you in
> > private...
> > 
> > She goes in the corner of the room.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > > : : Kup : :
> > > Kup: Yeah, there are a few. The ship wasn't fully maned when we left
> > the outpost we were on.
> > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Katya: I do not know... Kup?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...>
wrote:
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Katya: Then I would like you to help me build a sealed plastic
> > chamber
> > > > > that would be able to hold three bots at a time. Do you think
> > you can
> > > > > do that, quiaff?
> > > > > 
> > > > "Well yes its quite simple actully, we just have to code a
room with
> > > > plastic and make the room air tight so the plauge can't get out."
> > > > Kenzo explained "Are thier any spare room aboard the ship?" he
> asked.
